website_summaries.verdict: Benefit's dual-purpose tint gives a fresh, natural look to the cheeks or lips. Offers a matte finish.
pros: This long-lasting liquid blush is a sheer rose that's perfect for daytime wear
Can be built up for a pop of color, and as a lip stain it's kiss-proof
cons: Only one shade, so not for everyone
(It does have a sister product, Posietint, in a summery poppy pink.)
The rose scent has its detractors

customer_reviews.title: KNOCKOFF: Smaller and Full of Typos
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this product is a knock off. I have an empty bottle of the original Benetint cheek stain I bought from Sephora to compare. - smaller, shorter bottle - different logo color and font - writing in the back is full of typos and missing letters - flatter brush
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Smells Toxic!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a blood red liquid that smells terrible and stings just a little upon application. I should have read the toxicity review on EWG before purchasing. It brushes on much like nail polish only more like brushing on water. My lips stung a little bit after application. I only noticed a slight difference in the color of my lips. There is no visible trace of this product, unlike lipsticks and glosses. It is a true tint. For the little that it did, the high price, and the toxicity - it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Conway

customer_reviews.title: Completely damaged and unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad when I opened my package and the product arrived shattered and completely dried out with the box and pamphlet both stained but the inside of the amazon package had no staining. It was like the product was shipped already damaged and dried out. Completely unusable. I love benetint and have used benefit products for years and have never had this issue. So disappointed, would recommend finding it in store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Pippa

customer_reviews.title: It's fake.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just so obviously fake. I'm really beyond irritated. Wish I read some of the other 1-star reviews before ordering. It really doesn't compare to the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I live for this stuff. I strongly recommend this product, especially if you want a more natural blush. The only piece of advice I’ll give is this: blend immediately. If you let it sit in one place too long you’re a goner!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Love Benetint! A perfect natural look 💫💕✨
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Benetint for years. I don’t know what I would do with out it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Wild ☀️

customer_reviews.title: Old? Or fake?
customer_reviews.text: I saw that other review after we purchased it. They were saying that it was a fake one. So I ended up ordering a new one directly from Benefit and there’s difference in smell and the intensity. I don’t know because this one is fake or old but the 4 coats equals to 2 coats from benefit. I won’t be buying this again due to that.
customer_reviews.author: heejeong

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Stain lasts a while and I like the versatility of just putting one coat for a simple and natural look, or adding multiple coats for a bolder long-lasting stain.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I use it on my cheeks and it’s subtle and natural. I use on my lips for just a tint, not a lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Amcd19

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves it, was saaaad when she run out of it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter, who does not have any allergic problem ,she had tried it before and was thrilled!!!!! she tells me she uses this product a lot for the university and is enchanted with the "natural look" it gives and how much it lasts through the day... Yes she will buy it again, and would like to try the High Beam product ant the posietint cheek and lip stain Yes she will recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: melian

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it and I DID!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like you are wearing no makeup, if you only put a single coat on! More will give you a solid made-up look.
customer_reviews.author: Trincomalee

customer_reviews.title: Natural Color
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a tint blush for a while. This color Benetint is deep rose, but can be adjusted by the amount used. It is to be applied with the cap top brush, but I prefer to use my fingers after the first swipes. It takes a little practice, but lightly dabbing around apple of your cheek seems to work best. I like the tint because it is more long lasting than regular powder or cream blush and works well without foundation. I know they offer other colors so check around.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: rosy pink
customer_reviews.text: beautiful. i am allergic to most lipsticks, balms etc. this is the only one which works although it doesn't last tooling. wish it were in roller ball bottle would then be portable.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel de suabia

customer_reviews.title: Sun kissed look of color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Apply a hint of color to look sun kissed!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mcgrath Bennett

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, PHOTO IS INACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: This description is a lie. It’s is NOT the .3 oz.. It is the .22. They literally charge DOUBLE than the store price for LESS of the product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: laurelbuggy

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have purchased benetint. The last time was several years ago. I use it almost daily. It lasts and lasts. I use it on my cheeks and lips for a natural looking glow. It reminds me of how my face looks after coming in from the cold. Just a little rosy but not too much. I will say it takes a little practice to get it on just right. Just be sure to start with a very small amount and blend it right away. You can always add more but its difficult to remove if you go too heavy. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: seffy123

customer_reviews.title: Received empty bottle
customer_reviews.text: Entire bottle was empty and cover was soaked with dried liquid. The bottle was empty prior packing was done as there was nothing inside the packing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it on my lips and cheeks. I love the color, and it looks so natural! It lasts all day on my cheeks (literally, all day!). I have to reapply it on my lips, because I use chapstick and after a few hours it rubs off. But it is perfect! I am so glad I read that article where the lead singer from Paramore said she used this stuff. Otherwise I wouldn't have heard about this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mikolajewski

customer_reviews.title: Older product.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this a lot as it’s one of my favorite products but noticed that it was the old bottle style with the smaller brush. New product has changed both of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very watery
customer_reviews.text: This is fake not the same as real benetint. I should have listened to the reviews. Do your money a good thing and do not buy this fake one.
customer_reviews.author: I-M

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this tint for years, but I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this tint for years, but I've only had to buy a few bottles. They last so long! Sometimes I make it a whole year before having to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Allison M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lasting color
customer_reviews.text: Love my Benetint. It’s like food coloring for the lips & cheeks. Not moisturizing. Color lasts much longer than regular blush & lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: LISA E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great multi-function product. Provides natural color to lips and cheeks with staying power.
customer_reviews.author: sfjayhawk

customer_reviews.title: hands down the #1 blush ever!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best blush I have ever gotten! There are only couple make up items that I continue to buy! This is has always been at the top of my list. It gives you the most natural looking flush, and makes you look like your glowing effortlessly! No powder, no shimmer, just a very healthy natural glow! Amazon prices are much cheaper compared to store prices! This is the cheapest I have bought it!
customer_reviews.author: fluffy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last long but I love it, it gives you very natural color. I use it on my lips and my cheeks. It lasts on my cheeks longer
customer_reviews.author: najlaa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look powdery or cakey like others. Gives a nice
customer_reviews.text: My go-to blush for years now. Doesn't look powdery or cakey like others. Gives a nice, healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip tint I have found. It stays on for hours -longer if you put gloss or balm over it. I'm on my second bottle and use it daily. light color look very natural; just a hint of blush perk up my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing to change the color of my lips - I was so disappointed. In college I used it all the time and loved it. I don’t know what changed but I will never buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Elle Strike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer natural beauty choice!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute must have. Perfect for the natural look, perfect for the pool/beach if you want to stay natural but still show you have some color on your cheeks and lips. It shows no evidence of makeup, applies easily, stays on long.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: is very moist
customer_reviews.text: The lip color is deep, the skin is yellow, the plain color besmears, the lip glaze color number is too good-looking, does not feel the oil, is very moist
customer_reviews.author: Kathy  Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you apply it on your lips you would need to apply it more often, buut if you put it in your eyes or cheeks you would only have to apply it once. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ginnette

customer_reviews.title: Great color, bad taste
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Noticeable color but not too wild. Works great as a lip stain. It does not taste amazing if you get it in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: I like everyone else, love this.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things that I heard and kept seeing every where. It was my first benefit purchase. I love it. It works on your cheeks and your lips. I think it's amazing. It is a small bottle for the price but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee_Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Don't like lipstick but need color on the old lips and this is perfect. Little color or a lot, whatever I choose. Great as blusher also.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hamel

customer_reviews.title: 0.4 oz. old one was delivered.
customer_reviews.text: The product delivered is different with the picture. The bar code said that it's Benetint..ek and Lip Stain 0.33 Oune New but it's actually 0.4 oz old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  I'll buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says it will do. I really like it for everyday wear. It adds just a tint of color on your lips and cheeks so that I don't look so pale and washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Old bottle
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it came in the old bottle with the old brush. I hope it’s not expired
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Odd brush
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the light color and cute bottle. My only problem is the brush application. In order to apply it, you have have to swipe a nail-polish like brush onto your lips. It's hard to control, but overall worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best blush ever!
customer_reviews.text: love this. its the perfect "flushed" color and lasts ALL day, despite my oily skin. I apply this with a small stipple brush and it sets like a dream... work fast, because it is a stain after all.
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Sexy & natural looking
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff! This gives me a natural looking blush all day long and I don't have to worry about looking pale and colourless by midday because my blush has worn off or has rubbed off. Doesn't come off until you wash it off. Even with my sensitive skin, I haven't had any breakouts so far. I do dot on more than what the instructions prescribes, but its because my skin tone is darker. I tried it on my lips, and it felt really drying, but my intention for the benetint was only for my cheeks anyway. so no loss there. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jwhung

customer_reviews.title: IN THE PINK..ROSE..PEACH??
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST BLUSER LIP COOLOR YOU NAME IT.. IT WOULD BE GOOD IF IT DIDNT HAVE THE BRUSH I DONT USE IT. BRUSHES HOLD BACTERIA..
customer_reviews.author: CEW

customer_reviews.title: Love Benetint
customer_reviews.text: Benetint is the BOMB! It's so natural and pretty on the face. It just gives you a fresh look. The only drawback is it's a brush that you have to reuse in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Tint ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip tint! The color is and you can apply more for a darker shade and then add a gloss for a nice shine. Benefit also makes the Benetint with a gloss in a pocket size which you can refill with the larger Benetint like I am reviewing.
customer_reviews.author: Moxley

customer_reviews.title: a rose by another name
customer_reviews.text: This stain is made from the extract of a rose. It looks natural and smell delicious on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Sghrbr chic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love benetint! I have been using it for a few years now - it creates a beautiful, fairly long-lasting color. It serves as a great base color for lipstick. One of the better lip stains out there - I have tried many and most leave a residue. This goes on smoothly, smells wonderful, and you cannot even feel it! Just beware that if you are placing it on dry, cracked lips, the color will settle right in and look a bit odd. However, if you wipe your lips with a moist cloth beforehand, there won't be any problems.
customer_reviews.author: E. Deldin

customer_reviews.title: that should be great, i only use this a few times a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge amount of product and quite expensive. but if you're using it daily unlike me, that should be great, i only use this a few times a month. I had the tiny size and it ran out, i should have just bought the small size again because i'm kinda regretting wasting the money on so much product. It's the best rosey red lip tint I've ever used, and i've tried lots of korean brands who usually have the leg up in lip tint. Can't beat the formula and color and staying power of this one, at least in my opinion. It even fades nicely instead of fading in weird places and staying dark in others.
customer_reviews.author: mattie

customer_reviews.title: A huge fan of this product when I want a ...
customer_reviews.text: A huge fan of this product when I want a cheek or lip stain that will last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Great for a subtle and naturally looking blush and also a great lip tint.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Benetint is the BEST BLUSH EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Benetint is a little pricey, but I have to say that it is worth it. I LOVE how it just gives my cheeks a faint natural-looking rosey blush! There aren't many blush products that look so natural. I love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lip tint! Easy to wear, natural looking, and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: I heart amazon01

customer_reviews.title: great color, no highlight
customer_reviews.text: Hello everyone, I wanted Benetint for a really long time and now that i have it i can say it works as hoped, it gives you really nice colored cheekbones that lasts all day long, and you can wear it under a powder blush too. And it also smells good. The only thing i am not that excited with is that it has no shine or highlight. It's matte. Hope it helped :)
customer_reviews.author: claudia cioca

customer_reviews.title: julie
customer_reviews.text: great for lip stain and blush. Only use just a bit and it lasts all day. Looks natural without having to put too much on. The product lasts a long time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has been a staple in my make-up bag for YEARS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastice lip tint
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful lip tint. I love it. I have not used it as a blush but they say it works well for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: blush unlike any other!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush! I have oily skin and don't like to wear powdered blush. This is great! It gives my face such a nice subtle, rosy and healthy look and stays on all day! I like the rose scent too though it looks as if some do not. I agree with others that the cap isn't very strong. I tightened it too much once and broke it! It's too expensive for that to happen!!! I was on a trip so i had to throw it away. I did my the little pocket size for my travels which is great! The only reason i give it 4 stars and not five is that darn cap!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisGerondale

customer_reviews.title: Iv bought this for years and it didn't seen as pigmented like it was watered
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be thinner than I'm used to. Iv bought this for years and it didn't seen as pigmented like it was watered down
customer_reviews.author: Robert Randall

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: most natural looking cheek and lip color I have ever used. the color soaks in quickly so follow directions to keep from getting streaks
customer_reviews.author: Kerlit

customer_reviews.title: Benetint - every woman should have it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Choose to go with a darker tint in the evenings or a lighter tint for the office. Neverthless, no touch up is needed! I love the way it tints when I brush it on mixed with my foundation brush! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I like it at first
customer_reviews.text: This product was kind of a let down. I like it at first, but it fades extremely fast. I am not a fan of the smell. I think what Benefit was going for was a rosy smell, but it just smelled like chemicals. Imagine like the Summer's Eve PH Balanced Feminine Wash mixed with artificial rose scent. Other than that, it works well if you have something you just need a little pinch of color for. I used it as a blush and as a lip tint.
customer_reviews.author: rapera@goldmail.etsu.edu

customer_reviews.title: My wife just started to use it and she said this seems the fake since it was quite different from those she used previously.
customer_reviews.text: My wife just started to use it and she said this seems the fake since it was quite different from those she used previously.
customer_reviews.author: Yi LUO

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the blusher I've always been looking for. Not heavy, looks natural, and no need to put powder on when a few strokes of the finger will give one a natural blush. It lasts until I wash it off, too. I'll buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: blackdog

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get into this...
customer_reviews.text: Read this stuff is a favorite among makeup artists for celebs...of course I had to try it. I guess I just prefer lip color in a tube. One day when I was applying it, I spilled a good amount on my comforter. I'd forgotten it spills! Just not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kim / Chicago girl

customer_reviews.title: No, no,no
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a false one, but it just does not work at all. It is a sheer tint that disappears so quickly it is not even worth putting it on. I gave it to one of my secretaries.
customer_reviews.author: Andy28

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: On time and lovin it, really gives a fresh and healthy look.Use it daily and the smell is pretty nice too
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about three years and I love it! I rub in a little dab of color when I apply lotion and the look is flawless! It doesn't even look like I am wearing make up, I just look a little flush. I also put it on my lips and then apply gloss. So much better than blush, this doesn't rub off!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture Old bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product is not like the picture. It is the old packaging. What make matters worst is that I can not even open it. If you can get it open, the liquid is the same formula.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not worth the money. comes right off on the lips if you drink or eat.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Dog MoM

customer_reviews.title: Is the real one?
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure I purchased the real product. The bottle was cracked and the blush was not at all like the one I bought at Macy's (in the Benefit store). It leaves traces and does not spread or last the way the original one does. Highly disappointed. I would advise not to do like me and if your are looking for this product to buy it from a official/proper/reliable source.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It is so thin that and has such a strange consistency that it does not even stick on your skin or work!
customer_reviews.author: Dgonz

customer_reviews.title: fake!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a long time already and i always buy it at macy's. This is the first time i bought it here at amazon and i am so disappointed because it's fake you can tell by the label on the bottle how the words were misspelled and the stain wont even lasts long on my cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: new customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m blushing 😊
customer_reviews.text: This is just the most amazing cheek stain on the market. I tried cheaper versions but they just don’t match up. The cheeks luck like they were flushed by Mother Nature herself. Do yourself a favor and don’t waste money on imitations- I made that mistake for you!
customer_reviews.author: Baronessa di Tomassi

customer_reviews.title: ... Benetint - for 20 years and my skin looks great. I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I wear no facial make-up except Benetint - for 20 years and my skin looks great. I love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Yangas

customer_reviews.title: This is THE best cheek/lip stain
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best cheek/lip stain, IMO, on the market. I love Benefit cosmetics as a whole, but this is an absolute staple in my daily regimen. It doesn't look like makeup. It just looks the way our cheeks used to look when we were younger and had a natural pink hue to our lips and cheeks. A little pricey, yes. Though, it is made from rose petals.
customer_reviews.author: darksidedeb

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I read a ton of reviews on this and finally decided to purchase it because there were so many different opinions. I'm glad I did because this stuff is great!!!!!! 1 bottle will last you forever which totally makes up for how much it costs. When I put this stuff on my cheeks it lasts forever. I will apply 1 more time towards the end of the day but it does last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Benefit cheek stain goes on very easily and lasts quite a long time
customer_reviews.text: Benefit cheek stain goes on very easily and lasts quite a long time. I love the way it smells, just like roses. Use something to apply it, if you don't it will stain your finger tips. I love this product and it doesn't feel at all heavy. The look is very natural and it only takes a tiny swipe with the small brush inside.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo-May

customer_reviews.title: it is a little pricey - but goes on easy and provides just the right amount of color
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, it is a little pricey - but goes on easy and provides just the right amount of color. The product last for a long time as you only need to use a little for each application.
customer_reviews.author: Flewellyn

customer_reviews.title: but am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to pay the price for this product, but am so glad I did. The bottle lasts for a long time, the stain goes on natural and seems to last all day. And I love that it isn't greasy or cakey, so my makeup looks easy and natural.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking cheek stain
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lip/cheek stain. The color is nice and subtle with one application. Would be great if it lasted a bit longer, but I really like it, overall.
customer_reviews.author: fultonucci

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Can use for lips or cheeks. Very much a liquid so could splatter if you're not cautious
customer_reviews.author: DCFNP

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Much easier getting on Amazon than going to the mall.
customer_reviews.author: M. Behnke

customer_reviews.title: Great product and last for months
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and color . Easy to apply . Looks natural on your face
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: The first few days of using it was great, i loved it
customer_reviews.text: The first few days of using it was great ,i loved it. Hpwever after a week or so using it almost everyday it made my lips super dry.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It gives you a flush that looks totally natural and does not look like you're wearing blush. It's easy to apply and you only need a few drops, so it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: pip

customer_reviews.title: Hoped it would stay a little longer
customer_reviews.text: Not as "staining" as I had hoped. Was excited with the other reviews, but was disappointed. The color is great and a bit brighter than natural. Considering trying to "mix" it with something that will add staying power. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Like the new brush included as old one was too ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the new brush included as old one was too thin and resulted in drippage and streaky application. Been using this product for years and love it
customer_reviews.author: Dani Brady

customer_reviews.title: Not too red, not too light. Perfect color.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive. Make me looks alive and active. It remains forever. Not too red, not too light. Perfect with lipstick. I always put tint, and then put Lipbalm or lipstic.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I expected to like this with all the hype surrounding it
customer_reviews.text: I expected to like this with all the hype surrounding it, but I didn't think I'd love it as much as I do! The color looks great and natural!
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Use this all the time. Most natural cheek tint ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time . Most natural cheek tint there is.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: arrived in great shape - was a gift for my son's girlfriend ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered exactly as expected, arrived in great shape - was a gift for my son's girlfriend - she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fuller-Hull

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product has been watered down so it doesn't cover like it used to....very dissatisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: KeenonFreedom

customer_reviews.title: Just love Bene tint
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I've used before so I'm familiar with it. It is a little drying but the color stays on quite well and is a great multitasker blush and lip color. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Bamagirl

customer_reviews.title: Lips and Cheeks
customer_reviews.text: Benefit has got the answer to glowing cheeks and lips. Benetint stays on all day and looks so natural. I L-O-V-E it! I have been using Benetint for over 8 years and have not found anything like it!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Toole

customer_reviews.title: I adore this tint
customer_reviews.text: This tint is my favorite. I can't go out without it. Gives u more natural color for you lips and its so easy to use. Good quality 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Israa

customer_reviews.title: Benetint
customer_reviews.text: Good as blush and as lip pigment. Very natural look and long lasting on the skin and lips.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Chaplynska

customer_reviews.title: Lifelong Fan Of Benetint & Browzing
customer_reviews.text: I've worked for Benefit Cosmetics and hands down my two favorite products are Browzing and Benetint! Yes, I would recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: good but I don't like
customer_reviews.text: It is good product ...... but not as good as I expected...... Maybe because I am not suitable for this color ....
customer_reviews.author: XiaoyiWang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Have been using it for years. A great quick glow!
customer_reviews.author: S. murphy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for my lips. Goes on too bright and doesn't stain evenly. Also doesn't last for more than an hour. Thought I'd use it on cheeks like other reviewers do... but don't like it there either. Revlon "Just Bitten" products are far superior if you're looking for a lip stain - though they go on a little dark for my taste!
customer_reviews.author: Moi

customer_reviews.title: This product is miracle make-up.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to apply, stays on all day, looks very natural. Perfect after-sex glow. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lobotomy

customer_reviews.title: Not for skin with red/pink undertones
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I have light-toned skin with red undertones. It just made my skin look blotchy. Didn't show up well on my lips either. The smell of roses is extremely strong. Should have taken the advice of other reviewers... It just is not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Kady

product_meta.title: Benefit Cosmetics Benetint Rose Tinted Lip & Cheek Stain 0.33 FL OZ
product_meta.description: Its the original and still the best rose-colored cheek and lip tint. Kiss-proof and water-proof, this indelibly sheer tint gives you an innocent, yet provocative glow that will keep everyone guessing what has she been up to? Perfect blush and lipstick or lip gloss.
feature_bullets: Benefit's original rose-tinted stain is kiss-proof, see-through color for lips & cheeks that lasts for hours.
Naturally sheer & sexy on all complexions...it's innocent yet provocative.
Brush three strokes on the apples of your cheeks & blend quickly with fingertip. Apply on lips & blend. For a deeper "pop" of color, repeat.
Beauty tip: Amp up the staying power of your lip color...wear benefit under your favorite lipstick or lip gloss. Wear under high beam on cheeks for a healthy, dewy glow.

Originally created for an exotic dancer in the 1970s, Benetint has soared to cult fave status. It's loved by celebs, makeup artists and gals around the world. It's the sexiest flush you can get from a bottle!
